alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:32PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Washington and northeastern Morgan Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 532 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of McConnelsville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... McConnelsville, Malta, Bristol, Macksburg and Hackney. This includes Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 12 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
